projects.title: StockCastery
projects.description: Participated in GDG Cloud Kolkata HackDay Hackathon. With FinTech, Machine Learning, and web3integrations in one place, StockCastery provides crypto watch, tracking, and prediction. The project waschosen as of of the top 10 projects and was pitched in the Cloud Community Days 2022, Kolkata.

projects.title: SMDB
projects.description: SMDB is a Movies and TV Series App. You can navigate through the list, search for your favouritemovie and TV series or check for a trending show. You will get the complete details of the movie. Iused the MovieDB API for fetching the data and Material-UI for styling.

projects.title: COVID-Fighter
projects.description: A COVID precaution website built in JavaScript that displays covid cases, vaccinations, and deceasednumbers in your area by using GPS locations and retrieving data from the covid19india.org API for thespecified state and country.

projects.title: ToDo List
projects.description: It's a simple ToDo list made with JavaScript. It allows you to add Todos and delete them. This was my first ever project related to development.
